alert.note: Alert for Espanola Valley; Northwest Plateau; Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 2:27AM MST until March 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches except between 4 and 6 inches above 7500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Espanola Valley, Upper Rio Grande Valley, and Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Some roads may be closed. Significant travel delays are possible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Espanola Valley; Northwest Plateau; Upper Rio Grande Valley
